Weaver/pkg/shell/shell.go.description: handleExtract() now uses spinner.New() + Start() before extraction, spin.Fail() on error, and spin.Success() to show completion. Pattern: create spinner with message, start, run operation, call Success/Fail based on result.

Weaver/pkg.description: Package structure follows pattern of separate directories per feature (analysis, backend, concepts, config, runtime, shell). New spinner package should be at Weaver/pkg/spinner/.

Weaver/pkg/spinner/spinner.go.description: Success(message) and Fail(message) methods stop spinner and display colored status indicators. Success shows green ✓, Fail shows red ✗. Both include elapsed time if ShowElapsed is true. Empty message parameter uses current spinner message. Uses internal complete() method for shared logic.
